short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove dark UX patterns from booking.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remove the stress from booking a hotel.

This extension hides dark patterns on booking.com which create a feeling of urgency which encourage users to book now or miss out.
